label: MechanicalFailureMechanism
description: Failure related to some mechanical property

label: MechanicalFailureGeneral
description: Failure related to some mechanical defect but no further details known 14224(1.0)
synonyms: not meshing, does not self align, overstroke, release fault, slipping fault, slipping

label: LeakageFailure
description: External and internal leakage, either liquids or gases 14224(1.1)

label: Vibration
description: Abnormal vibration 14224(1.2)

label: ClearanceAlignmentFailure
description: Failure caused by faulty clearance or alignment 14224(1.3)
synonyms: excess play, out of adjustment, no clearance, misaligned

label: Deformation
description: Distortion, bending, buckling, denting, yielding, shrinking, blistering, creeping 14224(1.4)
synonyms: distortion, bending, buckling, denting, yielding, shrinking, blistering, creeping, bent, flat, dropped, buckled, deformed, flat spot, torn

label: Looseness
description: Disconnection, loose items 14224(1.5)

label: Sticking
description: Sticking, seizure, jamming due to reasons others than deformation or clearance/ alignment failures 14224(1.6)

label: MaterialFailureMechanism
description: Failure related to some material property

label: Burst
description: Item burst, blown, exploded, imploded etc 14224(2.8)

label: Overheating
description: Material damage due to overheating/ burning 14224(2.7)
synonyms: overheating, melted, warm, overheated, burnt, burning, brittled

label: Fatigue
description: Fatigue 14224(2.6)

label: Breakage
description: Fracture, breach, crack 14224(2.5)
synonyms: cracking, crack, fracture, broken, snapped, cracked, breach, exploded

label: Wear
description: Abrasive and adhesive wear e.g. scoring, galling, scuffing and fretting 14224(2.4)
synonyms: eroded, worn out, worn, scored, galled, scuffed, fretted, chipped, flaking, fluted, peeling, pitted

label: Erosion
description: Erosive wear 14224(2.3)

label: Corrosion
description: All types of corrosion, both wet (electrochemical) and dry (chemical) 14224(2.2)

label: Cavitation
description: Relevant for equipment such as pumps and valves 14224(2.1)

label: MaterialFailureGeneral
description: Failure related to some material defect but no further details known 14224(2.0)

label: InstrumentFailureMechanism
description: Failure related to some instrument property

label: InstrumentFailureGeneral
description: Failure related to some instrumentation but no further details known 14224(3.0)

label: ControlFailure
description: No, or faulty, regulation 14224(3.1)
synonyms: slow, no control, work intermittently, fail to open, fail to close, slow communication

label: NoSignalIndicationAlarm
description: No signal/ indication/ alarm when expected 14224(3.2)
synonyms: no signal, no reception, alarm fault, no indicator, no alarm

label: FaultySignalIndicationAlarm
description: Signal/ indication/ alarm is wrong in relation to actual process 14224(3.3)
synonyms: faulty signal, faulty alarm, faulty indicator, temperature fault, pressure fault, charge fault, electrical fault, overstroke fault, intermittent fault, temperature error, not counting, not reading, overheat fault

label: OutOfAdjustment
description: Calibration error, parameter drift 14224(3.4)

label: SoftwareError
description: Faulty, or no, control/ monitoring/ operation due to software error 14224(3.5)

label: CommonCauseCommonModeFailure
description: Several instrument items fail simultaneously 14224(3.6)

label: ElectricalFailureMechanism
description: Failure related to some electrical property

label: ElectricalFailureGeneral
description: Failures related to the supply and transmission of electrical power but no further details 14224(4.0)
synonyms: tripping out, running constantly, electrical fault, power fault, shutdown fault, wired incorrectly, tripped, low power, trip, overcharged, capacitance drop, out, fail, low, hydraulic fault, disconnected, faulty, spurious output

label: ShortCircuiting
description: Short circuit 14224(4.1)

label: OpenCircuit
description: Disconnection, interruption, broken wire/ cable 14224(4.2)

label: NoPowerOrVoltage
description: Missing or insufficient electrical power supply 14224(4.3)
synonyms: volt supply error, no excitation, not charging, charging fault, low voltage

label: FaultyPowerOrVoltage
description: Faulty electrical power supply e.g. overvoltage 14224(4.4)
synonyms: overload, overvoltage, supply error, flash over

label: EarthOrIsolationFault
description: Earth fault, low electrical resistance 14224(4.5)
synonyms: earth fault, earthing out, ground fault, arching, fault to earth

label: ExternalInfluenceFailureMechanism
description: Failure related to some external influence

label: ExternalInfluenceFailureGeneral
description: Failure caused by some external events or sustances outside the boundary of the item but no details are known 14224(5.0)

label: BlockageOrPlugged
description: Flow restricted/ blocked due to fouling, contamination, icing, flow assurance etc 14224(5.1)

label: Contamination
description: Contaminated fluid/ gas/ surface e.g. lubricant 14224(5.2)

label: MiscExternalInfluences
description: Foreign objects, impacts, environmental influence from neighbouring systems 14224(5.3)

label: MiscellaneousFailureMechanism
description: Failures with unresolved or unclear causes

label: MiscellaneousFailureGeneral
description: Failure mechanism that does not fall into the other 14224 categories 14224(6.0)
synonyms: hydraulic fault, disconnected, out of date, detached, derailed, deteriorated, fail to communicate, fail to operate, non-compliant,  not lighting, not sounding, resonance, out of date,

label: NoCauseFound
description: Failure investigated but cause not revealed or too uncertain 14224(6.1)
synonyms: going on and off, bypassing, keep blowing, falling off, movement, coming up, emptying, not cold, sticking, won't start, work intermittently, will not start, popped, issues unserviceable, failed, tight, out of service, shot, mismatched, doesn't turn on, not working, no good, doesn't work, error, missing, to be fixed, out, fail, low,  faulty, inoperable, no output

label: CombinedCauses
description: Several causes 14224(6.2)

label: OtherFailureMechanism
description: No 14224 code available 14224(6.3)

label: UnknownFailureMechanism
description: No information available 14224(6.4)
